name: tsup-tree-shaking
description: A POC to understand if tsup treeshake option is required for a library compiled by tsup to be treeshakeable.

scripts.clean: pnpm -r --include-workspace-root --parallel exec pnpm dlx rimraf dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.reset: pnpm -r --include-workspace-root --parallel exec pnpm dlx rimraf dist node_modules
